ModMetaData.name: Quick Jump to Location
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
You can middle-click on a letter to simultaneously dismiss it and jump to the location it references (if there is one).
=== Updates === 10/26/2022: Updated to 1.4 03/10/2022: Added option to jump to location only without dismissing.
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ If you enjoy my work and want to support me and my family, I take donations at: https://ko-fi.com/1trickpwnyta +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
